00037 EnumPropertyItem controller_type_items[] = {
00038     {CONT_LOGIC_AND, "LOGIC_AND", 0, "And", "Logic And"},
00039     {CONT_LOGIC_OR, "LOGIC_OR", 0, "Or", "Logic Or"},

00053 static struct StructRNA* rna_Controller_refine(struct PointerRNA *ptr)
00054 {
00055     bController *controller = (bController*)ptr->data;
00056 
00057     switch (controller->type) {
00058     case CONT_LOGIC_AND:
00059         return &RNA_AndController;
00060     case CONT_LOGIC_OR:
00061         return &RNA_OrController;
00062     case CONT_LOGIC_NAND:
00063         return &RNA_NandController;
00064     case CONT_LOGIC_NOR:
00065         return &RNA_NorController;
00066     case CONT_LOGIC_XOR:
00067         return &RNA_XorController;
00068     case CONT_LOGIC_XNOR:
00069         return &RNA_XnorController;
00070     case CONT_EXPRESSION:
00071         return &RNA_ExpressionController;
00072     case CONT_PYTHON:
00073         return &RNA_PythonController;
00074     default:
00075         return &RNA_Controller;
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void rna_Constroller_name_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const char *value)
00080 {
00081     bController *cont = (bController *)ptr->data;
00082 
00083     BLI_strncpy_utf8(cont->name, value, sizeof(cont->name));
00084 
00085     if (ptr->id.data) {
00086         Object *ob = (Object *)ptr->id.data;
00087         BLI_uniquename(&ob->controllers, cont, "Controller", '.', offsetof(bController, name), sizeof(cont->name));
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00091 static void rna_Controller_type_set(struct PointerRNA *ptr, int value)
00092 {
00093     bController *cont = (bController *)ptr->data;
00094 
00095     if (value != cont->type) {
00096         cont->type = value;
00097         init_controller(cont);
00098     }
00099 }
00100 
00101 static void rna_Controller_mode_set(struct PointerRNA *ptr, int value)
00102 {
00103     bController *cont = (bController *)ptr->data;
00104     bPythonCont *pycon = (bPythonCont *)cont->data;
00105 
00106     /* if mode changed and previous mode were Script */
00107     if (value != pycon->mode && pycon->mode == CONT_PY_SCRIPT) {
00108         /* clear script to avoid it to get linked with the controller */
00109         pycon->text = NULL;
00110     }
00111     pycon->mode = value;
00112 }
00113 
00114 static int rna_Controller_state_number_get(struct PointerRNA *ptr)
00115 {
00116     bController *cont = (bController *)ptr->data;
00117     int bit;
00118 
00119     for (bit = 0; bit<32; bit++) {
00120         if (cont->state_mask & (1<<bit))
00121             return bit+1;
00122     }
00123     return 0;
00124 }
00125 
00126 static void rna_Controller_state_number_set(struct PointerRNA *ptr, const int value)
00127 {
00128     bController *cont = (bController *)ptr->data;
00129     if (value < 1 || value > OB_MAX_STATES)
00130         return;
00131 
00132     cont->state_mask = (1 << (value - 1));
00133 }
00134 
00135 static void rna_Controller_actuators_begin(CollectionPropertyIterator *iter, PointerRNA *ptr)
00136 {
00137     bController *cont = (bController *)ptr->data;
00138     rna_iterator_array_begin(iter, cont->links, sizeof(bActuator *), (int)cont->totlinks, 0, NULL);
00139 }
00140 
00141 static int rna_Controller_actuators_length(PointerRNA *ptr)
00142 {
00143     bController *cont = (bController *)ptr->data;
00144     return (int) cont->totlinks;
00145 }

00147 #if 0 /* editable is set to false, comment for now. */
00148 static void rna_Controller_state_get(PointerRNA *ptr, int *values)
00149 {
00150     bController *cont = (bController *)ptr->data;
00151     int i;
00152 
00153     memset(values, 0, sizeof(int)*OB_MAX_STATES);
00154     for (i = 0; i<OB_MAX_STATES; i++)
00155         values[i] = (cont->state_mask & (1<<i));
00156 }
00157 
00158 static void rna_Controller_state_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const int *values)
00159 {
00160     bController *cont = (bController *)ptr->data;
00161     int i, tot = 0;
00162 
00163     /* ensure we always have some state selected */
00164     for (i = 0; i<OB_MAX_STATES; i++)
00165         if (values[i])
00166             tot++;
00167     
00168     if (tot == 0)
00169         return;
00170 
00171     /* only works for one state at once */
00172     if (tot>1)
00173         return;
00174 
00175     for (i = 0; i<OB_MAX_STATES; i++) {
00176         if (values[i]) cont->state_mask |= (1<<i);
00177         else cont->state_mask &= ~(1<<i);
00178     }
00179 }
00180 #endif

00184 void RNA_def_controller(BlenderRNA *brna)
00185 {
00186     StructRNA *srna;
00187     PropertyRNA *prop;
00188 
00189     static EnumPropertyItem python_controller_modes[] = {
00190         {CONT_PY_SCRIPT, "SCRIPT", 0, "Script", ""},
00191         {CONT_PY_MODULE, "MODULE", 0, "Module", ""},
00192         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00193 
00194     /* Controller */
00195     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "Controller", NULL);
00196     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "bController");
00197     RNA_def_struct_refine_func(srna, "rna_Controller_refine");
00198     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Controller",
00199                            "Game engine logic brick to process events, connecting sensors to actuators");
00200 
00201     RNA_api_controller(srna);
00202 
00203     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "name", PROP_STRING, PROP_NONE);
00204     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Name", "");
00205     RNA_def_property_string_funcs(prop, NULL, NULL, "rna_Constroller_name_set");
00206     RNA_def_struct_name_property(srna, prop);
00207     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_LOGIC, NULL);
00208 
00209     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00210     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00211     RNA_def_property_enum_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_Controller_type_set", NULL);
00212     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, controller_type_items);
00213     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Type", "");
00214     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_LOGIC, NULL);
00215 
00216     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "show_expanded", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00217     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CONT_SHOW);
00218     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Expanded", "Set controller expanded in the user interface");
00219     RNA_def_property_ui_icon(prop, ICON_TRIA_RIGHT, 1);
00220     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_LOGIC, NULL);
00221 
00222     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_priority", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00223     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CONT_PRIO);
00224     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Priority",
00225                              "Mark controller for execution before all non-marked controllers "
00226                              "(good for startup scripts)");
00227     RNA_def_property_ui_icon(prop, ICON_BOOKMARKS, 1);
00228     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_LOGIC, NULL);
00229 
00230     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "actuators", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
00231     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "links", NULL);
00232     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Actuator");
00233     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Actuators", "The list containing the actuators connected to the controller");
00234     RNA_def_property_collection_funcs(prop, "rna_Controller_actuators_begin", "rna_iterator_array_next",
00235                                       "rna_iterator_array_end", "rna_iterator_array_dereference_get",
00236                                       "rna_Controller_actuators_length", NULL, NULL, NULL);
00237 
00238     /* State */
00239     
00240     /* array of OB_MAX_STATES */
00241     /*prop= RNA_def_property(srna, "states", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_LAYER_MEMBER); */
00242     /*RNA_def_property_array(prop, OB_MAX_STATES); */
00243     /*RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE); */
00244     /*RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "", "Set Controller state index (1 to 30)"); */
00245     /*RNA_def_property_boolean_funcs(prop, "rna_Controller_state_get", "rna_Controller_state_set"); */
00246     /*RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_LOGIC, NULL); */
00247 
00248     /* number of the state */
00249     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "states", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
00250     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "state_mask");
00251     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, OB_MAX_STATES);
00252     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "", "Set Controller state index (1 to 30)");
00253     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, "rna_Controller_state_number_get", "rna_Controller_state_number_set", NULL);
00254     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_LOGIC, NULL);
00255 
00256     /* Expression Controller */
00257     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "ExpressionController", "Controller");
00258     RNA_def_struct_sdna_from(srna, "bExpressionCont", "data");
00259     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Expression Controller",
00260                            "Controller passing on events based on the evaluation of an expression");
00261 
00262     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "expression", PROP_STRING, PROP_NONE);
00263     RNA_def_property_string_sdna(prop, NULL, "str");
00264     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Expression", "");
00265     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_LOGIC, NULL);
00266 
00267     /* Python Controller */
00268     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "PythonController", "Controller" );
00269     RNA_def_struct_sdna_from(srna, "bPythonCont", "data");
00270     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Python Controller", "Controller executing a python script");
00271 
00272     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "mode", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00273     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, python_controller_modes);
00274     RNA_def_property_enum_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_Controller_mode_set", NULL);
00275     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Execution Method", "Python script type (textblock or module - faster)");
00276     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_LOGIC, NULL);
00277 
00278     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "text", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00279     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Text");
00280     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00281     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Text", "Text datablock with the python script");
00282     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_LOGIC, NULL);
00283 
00284     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "module", PROP_STRING, PROP_NONE);
00285     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Module",
00286                              "Module name and function to run, e.g. \"someModule.main\" "
00287                              "(internal texts and external python files can be used)");
00288     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_LOGIC, NULL);
00289 
00290     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_debug", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00291     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CONT_PY_DEBUG);
00292     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "D",
00293                              "Continuously reload the module from disk for editing external modules "
00294                              "without restarting");
00295     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_LOGIC, NULL);
00296 
00297     /* Other Controllers */
00298     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "AndController", "Controller");
00299     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "And Controller", "Controller passing on events based on a logical AND operation");
00300     
00301     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "OrController", "Controller");
00302     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Or Controller", "Controller passing on events based on a logical OR operation");
00303     
00304     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "NorController", "Controller");
00305     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Nor Controller", "Controller passing on events based on a logical NOR operation");
00306     
00307     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "NandController", "Controller");
00308     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Nand Controller", "Controller passing on events based on a logical NAND operation");
00309     
00310     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "XorController", "Controller");
00311     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Xor Controller", "Controller passing on events based on a logical XOR operation");
00312     
00313     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "XnorController", "Controller");
00314     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Xnor Controller", "Controller passing on events based on a logical XNOR operation");
00315 }
